org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant

Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant.Plant

  • public final class Plant
extends java.lang.Object
    Plant is a singleton and is the top-level object. The plant has an internal reactor which is the root of a tree of all reactors, though this tree is made using weak references.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Plant()
      Create a plant with the default configuration.
      Plant(int _reactorThreadPoolSize)
      Create a plant with the default configuration, but with the given reactor thread pool size.
      Plant(PlantConfiguration _plantConfiguration)
      Create a plant with the given configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void close()
      Closes all reactors and associated closeables, the plant scheduler and the reactor thread pool.
      static NonBlockingReactor getInternalReactor()
      Returns the internal reactor.
      static PlantScheduler getPlantScheduler()
      Returns the plant scheduler.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
